Add/Replace/Delete.Description: The ADD/Delete/Replace modifiers are used in a definition to Add/Delete/Replace an attribute to the Definition.
Add/Replace/Delete.Name: Add/Replace/Delete

Bottom.Description: Specifies the type of border to draw the Bottom. Parameters may be specified using comma-separated parameters.

Parameters.Keywords: Bold, Double Lined, Flush, Full Length, Normal, Thick, Thin

Bottom.Name: Bottom

Color.Description: Specifies the border color in display/alter/create mode.
Color.Name: Color

Left.Description: Specifies the type of border to draw the Left. Parameters may be specified using comma-separated parameters.

Parameters.Keywords: Bold, Double Lined, Flush, Full Length, Normal, Thick, Thin

Left.Name: Left

Print FG.Description: Specifies the border color in print mode.
Print FG.Name: Print FG

Right.Description: Specifies the type of border to draw the Right. Parameters may be specified using comma-separated parameters.

Parameters.Keywords: Bold, Double Lined, Flush, Full Length, Normal, Thick, Thin

Right.Name: Right

Top.Description: Specifies the type of border to draw the Top. Parameters may be specified using comma-separated parameters.

Parameters.Keywords: Bold, Double Lined, Flush, Full Length, Normal, Thick, Thin

Top.Name: Top

Use.Description: The USE keyword is used in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use
